entries.player_sorry_2: Ok.  I'll get back to work.
entries.player_reset_2: I don't want this mission right now.
entries.npc_reset_2: Very well. I hope you'll remember the importance of furthering the arts in Narmle -- as opposed to Restuss.
entries.waypoint_description_2: Here is a collection of alien artifacts for the Narmle Arts Minister, Oxil Sarban, and his Narmle Arts Gala.
entries.waypoint_description_1: A promising artist with a presentation sought by Narmle's Arts Minister, Oxil Sarban, for the Narmle Arts Festival.
entries.return_waypoint_description_2: The Narmle Arts Minister is expecting a collection of alien artifacts for the Narmle Arts Gala.
entries.return_waypoint_description_1: Narmle's Arts Minister, awaiting delivery of a presentation for the Narmle Arts Festival sent by a rising artist.
entries.player_sorry_1: I'll keep working on the mission.
entries.player_reset_1: I don't want this mission right now.
entries.npc_work_2: I don't know what else I can tell you, really. Please pick up the collection of artifacts as soon as possible.
entries.npc_work_1: I really don't know what else I can tell you. Please bring me the presentation.
entries.npc_smuggle_2: Here's that collection of alien artifacts. I carried them as far as I could -- good thing they're light. They're all carved dust grains -- need quite a magnification to see them.
entries.npc_smuggle_1: Ah! I am most excited! In a fit of inspiration I have revised my promised presentation of the Empire's finest military marches. Yes! It is now revised.
entries.npc_reward_2: What? Grains of dust? I have no way to display a pinch of artistic dust! This is sheer flummery! Whatever shall my Arts Gala do? This is somehow the work of those Restuss Jubilee fiends.
entries.npc_reward_1: What? What is this foul caterwauling? I can't play this noise -- our Arts Gala would become a laughingstock in Restuss! Well, I shall pay you, but I believe I'll cross a certain artist off my list of future contributors.
entries.npc_reset_1: Very well. I hope you'll remember the importance of furthering the arts in Narmle -- as opposed to Restuss.
entries.npc_noloc_2: The driver of the stranded cargolifter will relay coordinates to me shortly. Check with me soon.
entries.npc_noloc_1: I'm awaiting a contact from the artist shortly, giving the coordinates for the rendezvous. Check with me in a few moments.
entries.npc_more_1_1: Now I present a selection of sweet-toned Chadra Fan heart-splitter wailing serenades. Take it please to Oxil.
entries.npc_failure_2: You didn't bring that collection of alien artifacts? Well, perhaps that is for the best -- Imperial citizens are suspicious of such things.
entries.npc_failure_1: Did you not bring back that presentation? Our Arts Gala audience will never know the pleasure they missed.
entries.npc_breech_2: Hey! Are you from that Arts Minister?
entries.npc_breech_1: Ah! You are here looking for the presentation from me?
entries.npc_backtowork_2: Have you picked up that collection of artifacts? Our Arts Gala is waiting.
entries.npc_backtowork_1: Have you not brought back that presentation yet? Our Narmle Arts Gala audience will be agog when they finally see it.
entries.npc_4_2: These alien art objects represent traditions from worlds across the galaxy. I believe there is some unifying theme, but I don't know what it is. The collection's descriptions should make all clear. Can you pick it up?
entries.npc_4_1: I believe I'd best keep the name a secret, lest news leak out and spoil what should be a sensation. Those Restuss Jubilee people would die to steal away our prize catch. Please don't tell anyone about your assignment!
entries.npc_3_2: I'm sorry your commitment to the Narmle Arts Gala appears weaker than I hoped. You haven't been subverted by those Restuss Jubilee people, I hope.
entries.npc_3_1: I am sorry you can't help. This festival is a busy time for me.
entries.npc_2_2: Good. I expect you'll find the cargo at these coordinates. Please hurry!
entries.npc_2_1: Excellent. Being rather eccentric, this artist lives in the wilderness, and looks rather unusual. Be careful on your journey.
entries.npc_1_2: Our Narmle Arts Gala had bad luck with that so-called rising artist whose insane screechings you brought to me. To remedy our ruined schedule, I called in a favor and asked to exhibit a friend's collection of rare alien artifacts. My friend sent them, but the cargo lifter went off course and has broken down Can you pick up the artifacts from the driver?
entries.npc_1_1: Hello! I am Minister of Arts for the Narmle government. In this crucially important position, at this crucially important time of our Narmle Arts Gala, I have commissioned a holo presentation from a rising artist. It will certainly show up that imitative Restuss Arts Jubilee for the tone-deaf debacle it customarily is. Will you pick it up and bring it here?
entries.notit_2: I was hoping to get a collection of diverse alien artifacts for our Arts Gala. That is't what I expected.
entries.notit_1: I was expecting a presentation for our Arts Gala from a particular rising artist. That isn't it.
entries.next: I believe the Narmle Arts Gala is currently under control. If anything goes amiss, I'll keep you in mind.
entries.dontknowyou_2: I'm not waiting for you, friend.
entries.dontknowyou_1: I am not the one you are looking for.
entries.cant_work: I really could use your help once you aren't quite so busy.
